oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Evaluation of a new portable blood cow side test for calcium monitoring in cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Neumayer, M.
Hilmert, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: calving
metabolic disturbance
hypocalcemia
calcium measurements
dairy cows
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cows around calving are very vulnerable and susceptible for any metabolic disturbances. To identify cows at risk for hypocalcemia, a new portable on farm photometer was developed to enable the veterinarian to make on farm cow side decisions. The aim of this study was to evaluate this cowside test for calcium measurements of dairy cows.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 272
